about.title: Achieve global success with Türkel Fair Organization
about.html:
Türkel Fuarcılık A.Ş., a leading and experienced professional international fair and commercial event organizer in the Turkish fair industry, provides distinguished services in accordance with international standards to Turkish and foreign customers in fair participation planning, organization management, promotion and marketing and communication with its experienced, innovative and dedicated professional management and sales team of 76 people working in Istanbul Headquarters and Moscow/RF and Almaty/Kazakhstan field offices.

In addition, Türkel Fuarcılık A.Ş. also provides privileged service support to its international commercial sectoral fair participant customers in the areas of fair stand design and installation and technical services, logistics and transportation, international travel, transportation and accommodation.

fairSupport.title: EXPAND TO THE WORLD WITH FAIR SUPPORT
fairSupport.description: Make your brand more visible in global markets thanks to government supports that facilitate your participation in international fairs. You focus on growing your business, we will be with you in all steps of the fair participation process.
fairSupport.governmentText: The participation of our companies in international fairs related to goods trade and the promotional expenses of organizers are supported by the General Directorate of Exports of the Ministry of Commerce of the Republic of Turkey within the scope of "Decision No. 2017/4 on Supporting Fair Participants Abroad". In this framework, individual participation of our companies in sectoral international fairs determined and announced by the Ministry, as well as national participation in fairs organized by authorized organizers and participation in prestigious fairs leading in their sector are supported in certain items and varying amounts.
fairSupport.kosgebText: In accordance with the Kosgeb Law, multi-faceted development and support programs are implemented for small and medium-sized enterprises defined by the Regulation on SME definition and classification published in the Official Gazette dated 18.11.2005 and numbered 25997.
